nocubes.command.addSmoothableNoPermissio: You do not have permission to change if a block is smoothable or not
nocubes.notification.nocubesNotInstalled: Because NoCubes is not installed on this server NoCubes' custom collisions cannot work properly and have been temporarily disabled
nocubes.notification.visualsForcedByServ: This server forces NoCubes' visuals to be enabled at all times while playing to ensure a 'proper' player experience
